content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]Webkey is always doing its best to serve its customers. In order to it,we improved our charging system for the service. We have now multiple options to look at, so you can choose the most convenient and best option for your desire.

What improvement you can experience:

  • We can support the stairstep charging model without any interaction from the administration side. Also, the customer can update the subscription type any time
  • Annual and monthly subscription periods are also supported
  • With annual package you can get a discount

We have 3 types of plans you can choose from:

  • FREE: register and try us out free of charge with a limitation of 1 device
  • HOME: specifically for home usage
  • PROFESSIONAL: dedicated for companies, you can increase devices dynamically

Check out our service and solution and take the best opportunity you can have.
Read more here[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
